title: Update 'Days Since Our Story Began' counter to show 64

requirements.text: Update the configured relationship start date used by the "Days Since Our Story Began" counter so that the counter displays "64" (instead of ~"300") while keeping the counter behavior live (still computed from the configured start date and current time).

quotes:

days of love" u have to change "300" into "64"

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/valentine/config.ts, RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE is updated to the correct date such that the counter currently renders 64 in the UI.
The DaysSinceCounter component continues to compute and render the value from RELATIONSHIP_START_DATE (no hard-coded '64' in the component).
The section still displays the exact label text: "Days Since Our Story Began" and the suffix "days of love" with correct singular/plural behavior.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the counter implemented as a client-side live counter derived from a single configurable constant.
nonGoals: Do not change the photo gallery assets or their ordering.
Do not add new sections, animations, or music behavior changes.
